title: 40 years anniversary
text:
A cozy Resto bar in the Touristic part of Syracuse. Nice to have a refreshing drink on the terrace and looking to all the tourists passing by.
Friendly staff will help you to choose your favorite food. We recommend to try their pizza.

title: Romantic sera on the terrace
text:
We enjoyed a beautiful spring evening on the restaurant terrace very close to the sea enchanted by the view of Taormina in sunset light.
Starting with a bottle of Sicilian Prosecco assorted with the catch of the day and ending with a nice pistachio semifredo, the receipt for a perfect dinner.

title: Spectacular location
text:
Everything here is at superlative
They’ll make you feel like home.
Very beautiful view old Italian music. Great home made desserts

title: Very warm and friendly venue
text:
We had a nice evening due to the very friendly staff. Special congrats for the starters menu! The home desert was also very well appreciated.

The wine selection can support improvements or our choice was not the best one.

The experience should be in your to do list but be prepared for an expensive evening.

title: Honey moon every day
text: A real Balinese experience in the center of Bucharest... 3 hours of relaxation should be in everyone’s Sunday schedule especially when is cold and cloudy outside

title: GOOD Chinese food in Buchareest
text:
We used the Uber eats service for home delivery from Zen Garden, Chinese food.
Even if outside are 0 degrees Celsius the food arrived hot and very tasty
Thank you Zen Garden

title: Atheneum reloaded
text:
A very pleasant evening and delicious food.
You definitely should try it. Even if it is new in town it is a very promising bistro to become one of the best in town for fine dining

title: Impressive
text:
After a very nice trip on the hills around Viscri we had the real pleasure to eat a wonderful dinner in this family owned restaurant
Congrats for everything you have done here!

title: A drop of Napoli ... in Bucharest
text:
Not our first time here, but first time with friends and I was anxious If they will share my opinion about this place. After We eat 3 pizza the conclusion were those :
- very friendly italian host Guglielmo
- prosecco “ che gioia “
- pizza ? Mamma mia !!! Una meraviglia ! Vedi Napoli e poi Vivere !
Grazie, Italia

title: Reasonable
text:
It an easy and fast way to have a lunch before flight if you are too early in the airport

The food it’s better then in the airport but still far from traditional Greek food

title: Very peaceful sandy beach
text:
Everything seems ok! 20 eur/pers entrance and a lot of people on more than 300 sun beds.
Service is ok, you’ll have a ring bell on your umbrella to call the service staff for everything
It’s a little bit expensive

title: Fres fis really good
text:
Authentic family run fish taverna
A very nice culinary experience a restaurant that you must come in
Lavraki is one of the best fish to share in 4 pers

title: Nice touristic place under Acropolis
text: We had our diner on the stairs coming down from Acropolis. It was a nice experience but we can not say hat the food was something to talk about. A little bit busy during evening hours very normal for a famous old tavern. They have also a roof terrace but you need reservation for a table there

title: Must see, a little bit too hot in August
text:
It’s the most famous place to visit in Athens so you should see it if you are around
There is still an archeologic site and the Parthenon is full of metal scaffolds
The view over Athens is magnificent

title: So old and still standing
text: Unfortunately you are not allowed to go inside. The visit it’s just around. Several metal scaffolding on the front are blocking the view

title: Nice evening right in Assos bay
text: Even if it’s a touristic place we had a good diner in friendly atmosphere. Reservation needed but, if you are not in a hurry you can wait with a drink in the small bar organized in front of the entrance. Water melon from the house at the end of your diner

title: Beautiful sunset from the castle
text: Small and quiet old village, a must to see if you are in the area. We had 1 hour walk to the castle for some sunset pictures, incredible beautiful

title: Good traditional taverna
text: We had the normal diner here. Nothing spectacular and nothing bad. It is good for the money they ask. You’ll find a lot of restaurants on the same street and I cannot explain the top position of this one in the TripAdvisor list.

title: Most beautiful beach in the area
text: It’s one of the must to see places in Cephalonia! Even if it is not a sandy beach and even if when you enter the sea just in few meters the water riches your shoulder, I can confirm that this beach is one the most beautiful in the Island. You can rent 2 chairs and an umbrella for 6 eur and you can have good food in the two tavernas right near the beach

title: Nice beach with red sand
text: We just stopped for 30 min on this beach in our tour around the island. It looks nice with a small bar right near the beach

title: Just the red sand is the attraction
text: Nice pictures but this is not a place to spend more than one hour. If you like the motor boats sound and the ski jets , maybe you’ll spend more.

title: Very crowded place in August
text: As you probably discovered already this is one of this places that looks perfect in the pictures, or from above but it’s not a beach to spend your day on. It is so popular!!!

title: One of the best culinary exp on the island
text:
We stepped in a little bit hesitant because of the rank on trip advisor (346- in Kefalonia) and with every plate coming on the table we became more and more confident that this is the right choice.
Fresh sea food was our choice and it was delicious

This restaurant deserve a top place in Argostoli

Please try the Cephalomian Robola white wine. We had the dinner around 21.00, perfect hour to come in. Reservation recommended

And if you want a perfect 100 eur day and evening in the area please go during the day on Gradakia beach- nice music especially after 19.00 and very friendly staff

title: Hidden Gem in south Cephalonia
text:
We were so lucky to have this paradise so close to our studio. A small bay with fine sandy beach very quiet during morning when you can enjoy a good coffee and a light breakfast in the bar over the cliffs
Friendly staff and beautiful surroundings. The place is more with Greek people, not very popular for tourists.
Please look for my photos.

title: Nice atmosphere
text: We had a nice diner in a little bit to crowded place. It’s a restaurant where the volume counts. Everything was in a hurry from the staff. But the food and the decorations were beautiful. We stayed under a banana tree

title: We Realy liked it
text:
We were well impressed about the food and the kindness of the people working here
It is definitely a recommendation for a late diner. Reservation required
Cooked food it’s Eva’s recommendation but she also told us about the vinegar octopus - great choice
Thank you

title: Thank YOU !
text:
First of all we want to thank Paul for receiving us in a very crowded evening without having a reservation! We recommend to call for a reservation.
Great location 30m above the sea with fabulous view over the surroundings
We followed Paul recommendation and we are happy to eat a delicious musaka. The fish plate for 2 was also very enjoyable
They choose the quality instead of quantity . Just 8 tables and, because everything is fresh cooked, you have to be patient and wait a little bit. Your patience will be well rewarded
I forget to take the picture before starting eating... sorry for this, was so appetizing

title: Nice, spectacular trip down here
text:
Nice place to spend several hours at noon time
Long Beach with two lines of chairs and umbrellas very few quiet children.
Two tavernas where you can enjoy cold drinks in the shadow.
Several big rocks in the sea good for snorkeling
You’ll be impressed about the road. Asphalt all the mountains descend

title: Unlucky to be there
text:
Friendly staff, they tried to help us even if we had no reservation. The terrace was full at 21.00, just one big table waiting for the guests. Unfortunately it was a birthday celebration 30 people arriving during 30 min disturbing everything around, physically

Because of them the service for other guests was awful
And one more thing: we tried the Fried Octopus - rubber - not recommended

Sorry for the guys working there. Taffy

title: Beautifull
text:
We had a beautiful experience enjoining a coffee in the conference break on the hotel terrace, right beside the swimming pool.
Sunny weather and really nice view.
The restaurant a little bit too expensive

title: Unique view over Black Sea
text: If you are traveling to this part of Europe you have to visit this restaurant/ terrace. A little bit expensive comparing with other quality restaurants in the area but you’ll forget the price payed and you’ll remember just the beautiful atmosphere

title: Great experience
text:
Somebody built a village here!
Peaceful atmosphere and very nice view!
One of the best places to play golf in the world...
Friendly staff and good quality food, comfortable rooms quiet surroundings, the receipt for a perfect break

title: Much under expectations
text:
This property has potential to become a hotel in the future. For the moment is under construction
We have to mention the friendly staff which is a promise for the next years.
We’ll follow the evolution
place: Royal Grand Hotel and Spa - All Inclusive

title: Gorgeous sunset, excellent fresh fish
text:
What to say more than You should visit this place and eat dinner!
Splendid view to the lake Tasaul and the food, prepared in a traditional way, is fantastic

title: Good quality, affordable price
text:
A fancy classic hotel in one of the most beautiful resorts on the Black Sea seaside
We had a nice experience in an executive room at the first floor with sea front view and with an enormous terrace
Full bar in the hotel lobby and several nice terraces on the beach can complete your experience in Mamaia

title: Perfect sandy beach
text:
If you want to discover one of the finest sandy beach you should come to Mamaia
In the north part you’ll have the top party experience and in the south part the families with children are very present

title: Good price however...
text:
They are trying to sell you anything! Starting with your seat ( it is mandatory to buy it if you want to sit next to your companion ) continuing with cabin bag ( every traveler has regular dimensions even if the company requires really small ones) and now they are selling even raffle tickets...

For a 2hrs trip you can close the eyes to the uncomfortable sits, lack of space and expensive food.

title: Tourists trap
text:
If you’ll not find a place to drink something around Colosseum you can come here... nothing good to recommend in this cafe/ Resto

Prices are high and this just because the location
You’ll not see the colosseum

title: Must be
text:
Nice very well known place in Rome in the list of every visitor
Expect to find a lot of tourists and photographers from Pakistan trying to get tourists money for an instant photo... be careful, some of them become aggressive even if the police is around

title: Much ADO about nothing...
text:
If you want to find how you’ll feel after a robbery you have to visit this place during the dinner time

After we ordered the drinks we decided to skip the dinner here.

After we received two times the prosecco in dirty glasses and with no more gas inside the waiter decided to bring a little bit aggressive a new fresh bottle and a clean glass at the table

The prices are 30-40% higher than any other Resto just because the location is in Piazza Navona.

They are very proud with “since 1946” but this should be something obliging not just a marketing tool

Il Tartufo should be tried ... just because it is since 1946...

title: Gorgeous
text:
You cannot visit Rome without being here
The theatre is under reconstruction! You have to imagine how it was thousands of years ago.
Very impressive

title: Very impressive
text: We spent 4 hours in here. Every step was a little piece of history. Please visit the dome to understand the dimensions of this buildingd

title: May mountain evening
text:
Nice location surrounded by old trees, friendly staff especially MR. Corneliu...
great moments with friends
Delicious pizza
Full bar experience

title: Fabulous
text:
You have to visit this hotel and mandatory to stay at least 3 nights
You’ll enjoy the beautiful landscapes of Brasov County and the silent nights in Poiana Brasov
The staff hospitality and the new dinner menu in Altitude restaurant should be a perfect receipt for a lovely city break
We had the ostrich salad and the parfait with disarono . Yummy

title: Old times
text: Overall we had a good experience but I have to mention that the time has passed over this building! Friendly stuff, several trainee employees are trying to keep the standards up. There are some investment needed, that’s for sure

title: Efficiency
text: I have to recognize that Lufthansa is still one of the top company in transport in Europe. Time reliable, basic service, friendly and even jokey flight attendants are the ingredients for a pleasant trip

title: Beautiful terrace
text:
Taking advantage of a very nice spring afternoon and enjoying great Turkish food in the terrace are the ingredients of relaxation
You need to try the Fresh and tasty food and the Ayran

title: Acceptable But...
text:
In general I had nice experiences in this restaurant. Nice people, nice music and good Italo-Romanian food.
Today I am a little bit disappointed : no draft beer and the pastas are over cooked .
Hopefully next time it will be better!
Thank you for a very generous and tasty lemonade with mint and ginger.

title: Still one of the best
text:
Beautiful evening spent with friend close to the stars.
Great view, relaxing live music, very tasty food and one of the best ROMANIAN wines.
Congrats for keeping the standards up

title: One of the best luxury locations in the heart of the city
text:
You should consider it as one of the best places to stay in Cluj. An old house very nice renovated with modern furniture. Walking distance to the main square (5-7 min) but very quiet for a healthy sleep.
You’ll find all the confort of a pretty and cozy home
It’s nice to share it with some close friends or your family

title: Nice and quiet location
text:
I had a nice experience in this hotel! They offer a correct 4* room at a very affordable price.
About the confort I have a suggestion: please consider to change the pillows or to offer your customer the possibility to choose from different types.
Thank you for your kind hospitality

title: Nice evening with friends
text:
Thank you Denis for cooking for us! It was a nice experience watching all the process! We really appreciate your efforts!
We are not very experienced in this kind of restaurants. We had the impression that the food was a little bit over cooked.
We recommend the duck... sweet and tasty

title: Classic and tasteful
text:
Even if the time passes over this place, the taste of the food and the beautiful Austrian atmosphere is present as is was in the first day of this restaurant existence

Ask about the history of the Tafelspietz but first of all you should try one

title: Classic and elegant
text:
Enjoying a drink in the bar, full of people and listening to a piano music it’s an unique and authentic experience in Wien

Ideal hotel for a city break

Congrats to the all hotel team for contributing to a wonderful anniversary

title: Excellent as expected
text:
Happy to be in the center of the city of Bucharest and having a top view on the neighborhood
I found great people really pleased to help me in any demands
Breakfast in Corso was nice and quiet just beside the town morning crowded traffic

title: Nice place... some improvements needed for the menu
text:
You’ll find a beautiful location in the old city of Brasov very close to Piata Sfatului

A big variety in the menu, a little to much for an Italian restaurant

One of the good places to eat dinner in Brasov

title: As friendly as you want it
text:
Please consider it one of the most friendly pubs in Bucharest!
Fancy atmosphere, nice cosmopolite people and

title: Nice place, some improvements neede
text:
We found a nice place in the old city center of Bucharest, small and cozy
Fancy people ready to party after a urban food diner

Unfortunately, even if the menu is new( 2-3 weeks), there are some missing products, wines and appetizers

We enjoyed very nice music
Overall a nice experience!

title: Amazing place!!! Love at first sight
text:
Located in one of the best neighborhood of Bucharest in a nice Vila, you’ll be surprised by a very nice design, cozy atmosphere comfortable tables

Great wine selection and tasty food

You have to be here!
